Description: Wooden double ointment-spoon; painted plants and birds in the two bowls; open-work handle depicting two Bes-figures.
Curator's comments: Published: Fredericq, JEA XIII, p.11? Wallert, Der Verzierte Loffel, (1967), p.112. Egypt's Dazzling Sun, (Cleveland, 1992), p.343 ref.44; p.352 ref.3; p.356 ref.3. M.A. Corzo, Nefertari Luce d'Egitto, (Rome 1994), p. 163 [34]. C. Alfano, Nefertari Regina d'Egitto, (Le Ciminiere 1999), p.31 [31].
